channel.title: Ouch.. parkour *shakes fist*
channel.description:
[img]http://img293.imageshack.us/img293/2788/dsc01838pr2.jpg[/img] [img]http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/8295/dsc01846mi4.jpg[/img] [img]http://img134.imageshack.us/img134/7660/dsc01841zl6.jpg[/img] [img]http://img134.imageshack.us/img134/6541/dsc01845ew5.jpg[/img]
Parkour tag = ouch... (Btw that's like my shin/side of it almost)
It swelled over the span of 10 seconds, I actually watched it swell to the point it got too, which was pretty weird.
Bought Oxycontin right after that n got faded =) haha.
I might have to take it easy on parkour though.. I recently found out I have Osgood Schlatter Disease, among other problems with my legs so.. I really have to go to a doctor's to check up on everything. :( :( :( :(

item.title: Ouch.. parkour *shakes fist*
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:11, topic:210311”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=277200.msg2259570#msg2259570 date=1212506850]
Got any vids of you doing parkour? I’d love to do it but I can’t because I can potentially snap my spine in half if I miss-land something
[/quote]
whats a sport without danger my friend?[/quote]
Don’t think that has been posted yet; but Greeny had epic back surgery. He has a big scar from his neck to his lower back (Don’t you love myspace).

Read full topic

item.title: Ouch.. parkour *shakes fist*
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

I don’t understand? You cut up your knee and shin? As long as there’s no damage to the bone it’s not that amazing, it was bound to happen.

item.title: Ouch.. parkour *shakes fist*
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:15, topic:210311”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=277200.msg2259614#msg2259614 date=1212520893]

Got any vids of you doing parkour? I’d love to do it but I can’t because I can potentially snap my spine in half if I miss-land something

whats a sport without danger my friend?

No, I can’t do the sport because of titanium bars in my back, that if I fell from a great height or I fell on my back would actually snap and take out my spinal column with them. I was all for dangerous sports before my life was at risk

Funny thing is I’m actually banned from skydiving and bungee(sp?) jumping and a few other extreme sports. Sucks tbh.
[/quote]
i can imagine that having titanium bars in your back would prevent you from doing sky diving i really feel sorry for you because skydiving is a perfect feeling in every way shape and form there is nothing comparitive to it in this world[/quote]Except being me!

Haha, nah… I wish I had a vid. I’ll probably post one up in a month or so once I get better.

Read full topic

whats a sport without danger my friend?
[/quote]

No, I can’t do the sport because of titanium bars in my back, that if I fell from a great height or I fell on my back would actually snap and take out my spinal column with them. I was all for dangerous sports before my life was at risk

Funny thing is I’m actually banned from skydiving and bungee(sp?) jumping and a few other extreme sports. Sucks tbh.[/quote]
i can imagine that having titanium bars in your back would prevent you from doing sky diving i really feel sorry for you because skydiving is a perfect feeling in every way shape and form there is nothing comparitive to it in this world

item.title: Ouch.. parkour *shakes fist*
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:11, topic:210311”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=277200.msg2259570#msg2259570 date=1212506850]
Got any vids of you doing parkour? I’d love to do it but I can’t because I can potentially snap my spine in half if I miss-land something
[/quote]
whats a sport without danger my friend?[/quote]

No, I can’t do the sport because of titanium bars in my back, that if I fell from a great height or I fell on my back would actually snap and take out my spinal column with them. I was all for dangerous sports before my life was at risk

Funny thing is I’m actually banned from skydiving and bungee(sp?) jumping and a few other extreme sports. Sucks tbh.

Read full topic

item.title: Ouch.. parkour *shakes fist*
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

well the floor is obviously gonna be the final thing you land on whether it be upside down right way up or on your arse either way its fun ultimately its down to how much you practice i recommend going to your local sports hall and renting it out once a week with gymnastic equipment to practice or find a good simple spot to get better thats how we did it at out school we started with a wall that got progressively higher we just vaulted over it at first then we jumped off spring up the highest part and then we went for distance with a bench by vaulting across it

Read full topic
